characters: The Emperor Ming (as Max Von Sydow)

dialogues.Vultan:
[1]   
[2]  
[3]Ho! -- Barin! - I knew my Hawkmen would catch you one of these days. 
[4]Not in my Kingdom -- here you're just a stray animal to be killed for our sport! 
[5]What would you do if you'd caught me in Arboria? 
[6] As FLASH and DALE are lowered on it. 
[7]No. What have you to say to Vultan, Prince of the Air? 
[8]  
[9]You're a leader, he? 
[10] 
[11]Enough!  These vagrants talk a brave fight, my Hawkmen! Shall we test their words? 
[12] 
[13]Take them below -- put them together. 
[14]Prepare them! 
[15]Arm the disc! 
[16]You've won, Earthling! Drop him to doom! 
[17]What is this?? 
[18]  
[19]What creature wants to die? 63. 
[20]We'll save these Earthlings! - Curse Ming! -- Into the air, my Hawkpeople - fly! 
[21]I don't understand this. I think I've gone mad. 
[22]Don't look back, Hawkman. Head for that cloud-cover!  Where's this capsule of yours, exactly? 
[23]Pick it up, Captain! 
[24]What if he fails? This is suicide, Barin! I can't order my men to suicide! 
[25]The flight brought me back to my senses -- good luck and goodbye. 
[26]We'll build another. 
[27]  
[28]He calls us crazy -- 
[29]Through the force-field, my Hawkmen! The pass is narrow -- dive three-by- three! Any man who wishes to turn back may do so! 
[30]  
[31]Who are these Earthlings, that so many would die for? 
[32]Onward, Hawkmen! Dive! We outnumber their arrows -- overwhelm them! 
[33]Ming!
dialogues.Aura:
[1]
[2]  
[3]  
[4]Don't kill him yet, Father. Give him to me! 
[5]I can handle Barin. 
[6]But you adore me, Father -- you ca refuse me nothing . Yes? 
[7]Take a deep breath! Grab my ankle after we hit the water -- I'll lead you! 
[8]Catch your breath -- then I'll take you up and find you a disguise. 25. 
[9]I'll fly you to the forest of Arboria - we'll find a way. 
[10]Do you realize how foolish you are to tell that to me -- Ming's daughter? 
[11]You're funny -- are all Eathlings like you, Flash Gordon? 
[12]The plasma core. It's e source of the energy-beam my father ia aiming at Earth. You can't stop it. Ming is merciless and all-powerful! 
[13]The slaves are Lizard Men. Once they had their own water Kingdom, the fairest of Mongo. Then they dared to rebel. They will suffer for it here forever. 
[14]You can't reach him. If a soldier spots you, it's instant death! -- Come! 
[15]Forget Dale Arden! 
[16]Forget her, Flash Gordon: I saw a look in my father's eye -- I think he intends to marry her. 
[17]Oh you ask so many questions. I'm taking you to people who'll help you. Trust me! 
[18]Trust me! 
[19]Here we are. 
[20]I've dressed you as a Royal Pilot, First Class. We'll slip into my personal car and you'll fly it. 
[21] 
[22] Learn from me -- I'll teach you so much! 
[23]  
[24]  
[25]Frigia -- eleventh of the moons of Mongo. It's inhabited by the Bear Men who eat their own young... 
[26]Now pull up -- go starboard around that next moon rising -- Ardentia. 32. 
[27]Of course - the Sand Men. Every Moon is a kingdom -- seperate and hostile to all the others. They have nothing in common but Ming's rule -- and their hatred of him. 
[28]Fight Ming the Merciless? You saw what happened to the Lizard Men. 
[29]I don't know these words what's a "team"? 
[30]Telekinetic Thought Transfer.  I'm going to get together with Prince Barin in Arboria and tell him I'm arriving. He's the one who'll help you. 
[31]Because he does anything I ask. He loves me. 
[32]If I showed you how. But I'm not going to. 
[33]What are you doing? 
[34]Are you mad> We're diving straight at Ardentia! 
[35]   
[36]Enough! 
[37]There's Arboria! 
[38]Who? 
[39]Follow me. 
[40] Making their way swiftly through it between earth and heaven, crossing this green world on branches and trunks of monster vines. FLASH pauses. 
[41]Ssssh...... Trust me! 
[42]  
[43]It's Barin's hunt! Watch! 
[44]  
[45]It means nothing. They only shout that because it's treason not to. They hate Ming. 
[46]Go inside -- let me talk to Barin first.  Foolish Earthling - trust me! 
[47]It's so long since I've been with you, Barin -- I couldn't stand it. Please don't be too angry at me for coming. 
[48] 
[49]I've dreamed of it! 
[50] 
[51]Flash Gordon -- come out! 43. 
[52]Hide him from my father -- don't let him wander -- keep him for me! 
[53]You still must -- I'm playing a game! 
[54]He's a mere toy to me, my love -- when I'm tired of it we'll kill him! 
[55]It's the risk I ask, Barin hide him for me in Arboria. 
[56]Are you so afraid of my Earthling, Barin; Won't you even give him a chance? 
[57]I'll do that. 
[58]If your love for me is great enough, Barin, surely it will protect you from the serpent -- no? 46. 
[59]It's an even chance now, Flash Gordon -- that's better than Daddy would have given you -- 
[60] 
[61]  
[62]  
[63]  
[64]Princess Aura returns to Mingo City The passage through the force-field opens at her approach -- 
[65]Daddy darling -- am I with you? Are you getting me? 
[66]Barin -- my only -- I swear I didn't mean to get you into this! 
[67]Spare him Daddy -- oh please spare 
[68] 
[69]When I think of being given to Klytus, I wish it was myself who had fallen. 
[70]Then what is it that melts into my eyes, Dale Arden? Feel it breaking -- 
[71]Ming tired of her. He blew my Mother into outer space. I look into the night sky sometimes and wonder what star she's orbiting --
dialogues.Klytus:
[1]Hail Ming! Shall I drown them in the Sea of Fire? 
[2]
[3]Sirs, Earth is the meaningless planet you are in the process of obliterating. 
[4]This woman will amuse you. 20. 
[5]She betrays you! She'll take him to Aboria! 
[6]Don't be too sure! 24. 
[7]Mongo is restless today. Your vessels stray from their appointed kingdoms.... 
[8]Dale Arden and Flash Gordon? Will I send out the Imperial Fleet to bring them back? 
[9]Sire, it is not for me to tell Great, Ming that he is making mistakes. 
[10]We'll find vultan later. Where's Flash Gordon? 
[11]I can't remember. I feel danger -- but I cannot see it. 
[12]I foresee another thing. In one minute exactly, the Earthling space capsule will be seen on the scanner. 
[13]What? 
[14]Destroy it. 
[15]In my pocket. 
[16]I foresaw at blow -- 
[17]

dialogues.Barin:
[1] 
[2]I scent a Tiger Man near the lodge! Form battle lines above and below! 41. 
[3] ANGLE - BARIN advancing by himself, HEARING the triumphant SHOUTS of his men. 
[4]Not him! Bring him back for sport: 
[5]Aura! 42. 
[6]Angry at you? 
[7] 
[8]You'll stay the night? 
[9]Get me a sword --  This is the fiercest Tiger Man we have ever hunted. I'm going to kill him now -- and dedicate his blood to you, my beloved. 
[10]I know you, Aura -- the more a man risks, the greater your passion. If I knew a greater risk, I'd take it. 
[11]What in hell? My help? 
[12]

[18]

dialogues.Dale:
[1]Will you SHUT UP? (as FLASH's head

[4]God, I hate flying -- I'm Dale Arden it's crazy of me to hate flying -- I'm a travel agent, you see? -- I've just been checking out a little hotel in Vermont -- can I still have that candy bar?  Are we going backward? 
[5]Holy cow! Look at the clouds! 
[6]Can you fly it? 
[7]Oh boy! Ever hear about the man who fell ninety stories from a window and didn't break a bone?

dialogues.Priest:
[1]Do you take her, this Earthling, Dale Arden, to be your Empress of the hour? Do you solemnly promise to use her as you will -- not discard her until such time as you grow weary of her? 
[2]The wedding ring, please -- 
[3]Recite after me -- with this ring I thee wed --
